article_title: Ask a Fool: Time to Buy Sirona Dental Systems Stock? -- The Motley Fool
article_text:
In this edition of The Motley Fool's "Ask a Fool" series, Motley Fool health care analyst Michael Douglass takes a question from a reader, who asks: "I've been thinking of investing in Sirona Dental Systems because my dentist uses their equipment/software and it is amazing! What are your thoughts?"

Michael gives his take, noting Sirona's growth opportunities and exposure to potential emerging markets (about 22% of revenue last quarter came in currencies not including the dollar or the euro). But is that growth enough to make the stock a strong investment? Check out the video below to find out.
